name: Simple Ogre Luck
description:
A simple slot game on where you are fighting dungeon enemies as an ogre. Obtain 3 of the same item to upgrade it and have more powerful items. 

Why an ogre? I'm not really sure, but when it comes to luck, I always think of Ogre Magi from Dota 2 and his multi casts.

Had to cut a lot of mechanics due to the time limitation, but all in all, I am pretty proud of what I have achieved in 50 hours. I hope you have fun playing this small game.

Contains :

  • 11 Base Items
  • 22 Item Upgrades
  • 32 Enemies

Thank you to all of those who have and will play this game, thank you to my fiancé for always supporting me on what I do, and thank you Mark for the fun and challenging game jam.

Assets Used: 

[Art] https://www.kenney.nl/assets 

[Art] https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles-supplemental

[Art] https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/13229

[Audio] https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/ultimate-sfx-music-bundle-everything-bundle

Everything else is created by me  : )

Inspired by :

Luck be a Landlord and Dota Auto-Chess
